channel.title: AP News - US News
channel.description: Top US News stories from AP News

item.title: Motive still unknown after suspect in the Brown attack and MIT professor’s killing is found dead
item.description: Investigators are trying to sort out why a former Brown University student allegedly opened fire on the campus decades after he dropped out and later gunned down an esteemed Massachusetts college professor he attended school with in Portugal in the 1990s.

item.title: Suspect in Brown University shooting and MIT professor’s killing was once a physics student
How one anonymous tipster cracked the Brown University shooting case
